scripts.lighthouse: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path -Path './lighthouse-reports')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path './lighthouse-reports' -Force } ; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss' ; lighthouse http://localhost:4321 --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-reports/lighthouse-report-$timestamp.html --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo"
